title: Aeroacoustics
description: Lighthill's theory of aerodynamic noise and extensions, flow/acoustic interactions, feedback phenomenon, supersonic jet noise, aeroacoustics of ducts, propeller noise, helicopter noise, sonic boom.

prerequisites: AE 3021 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
